channel.title: How To Make A little Firecracker
channel.description:
Need:
[ul][li]Sparkerls 1 pack[/li] [li]2 Bottle tops same size[/li][/ul]
[b]-Step 1-[/b] Crumbble the sparkerls in to one of the Bottle tops [b]-Step 2-[/b] Leave about 1/4 of a sparkler (for the whick) [b]-Step 3-[/b] Drill or Poke a hole on the other bottle top (just big unuff for the whick) [b]-Step 4-[/b] Tape the Bottle Tops together (Duck tape helps) [b]-Step 5-[/b] Put on Somthing that wont burn.. [b]-Step 6-[/b] Light the whick stand about 5 feet away or more
Extra's: Add crummbled chalk for colour
Tut By -SCOTTY-

item.title: How To Make A little Firecracker
item.dc:creator: @SCOTTY1 -SCOTTY-
item.description:
@SCOTTY1 wrote:

Need:

[ul][li]Sparkerls 1 pack[/li]
[li]2 Bottle tops same size[/li][/ul]

-Step 1-
Crumbble the sparkerls in to one of the Bottle tops
-Step 2-
Leave about 1/4 of a sparkler (for the whick)
-Step 3-
Drill or Poke a hole on the other bottle top (just big unuff for the whick)
-Step 4-
Tape the Bottle Tops together (Duck tape helps)
-Step 5-
Put on Somthing that wont burn…
-Step 6-
Light the whick stand about 5 feet away or more

Extra’s:
Add crummbled chalk for colour

Tut By -SCOTTY-

Read full topic
